# example-col

Columns layout content within rows. Size and offsets can be (responsively) set.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                    | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Default        |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `alignSelf` | `align-self` | Individual alignment of column | `ColAlignSelf.Center \| ColAlignSelf.End \| ColAlignSelf.Start \| ColAlignSelf.Stretch`                                                                                                                                                | `undefined`    |
| `offset`    | `offset`     | Number of columns to offset.   | `ColOffset.Eight \| ColOffset.Eleven \| ColOffset.Five \| ColOffset.Four \| ColOffset.Nine \| ColOffset.None \| ColOffset.One \| ColOffset.Seven \| ColOffset.Six \| ColOffset.Ten \| ColOffset.Three \| ColOffset.Two \| ColOffset[]` | `undefined`    |
| `span`      | `span`       | Number of columns to span.     | `ColSpan.Auto \| ColSpan.Eight \| ColSpan.Eleven \| ColSpan.Five \| ColSpan.Four \| ColSpan.Nine \| ColSpan.One \| ColSpan.Seven \| ColSpan.Six \| ColSpan.Ten \| ColSpan.Three \| ColSpan.Twelve \| ColSpan.Two \| ColSpan[]`         | `ColSpan.Auto` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description    |
| ---- | -------------- |
|      | Column content |
